attributes.action: no legitimacy of the Iranian government

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Severe UK-Iran ties, withdraw recognition of Iran’s regime & expel all diplomats" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/756775
